page.title: 15A day in the life of a child
page.content: At about 7am I get up and breakfast with the family at 8am. I pack my bag for school. The rest of the children from down the road come to our house and Mom takes us all to school. The doors are usually locked but at 8.50 the caretaker opens them. We hang our coats and bags up. I take my reading book and spelling book into the classroom. I write my 4 spellings down off the blackboard while Mrs Watson takes the register. Then the whole school goes in for assembly. We have a hymn, a story and a prayer. Next we usually have a maths lesson, then playtime followed by SRA. We watch a television programme and have lunch. We have games, playtime and a story before going home.I change into some different clothes and play outside. I have tea then play out again. At 8.30 I go to bed.
